The Horus Heresy: Battle of Tallarn - Ascendance Campaign

name: The Horus Heresy: Battle of Tallarn - Ascendance Campaign
summary: Before the crash-landing of 'The Eagle's Talon' unleashed a wave of radiation on Tallarn, while desperate skirmishes played out in the subterranean confines of the Sightless Warren, war raged on the surface still.
